sentences: Rinnastetaan nämä kaksi asiaa vertailun vuoksi.
Et voi rinnastaa tätä tapahtumaa menneisyyteen.
context: The Finnish verb 'rinnastaa' means to equate, compare, or make a parallel between things. It's often used when drawing similarities or making analogies between different concepts, people, or situations. The word can be in different forms: rinnastaa (infinitive), rinnastetaan (passive form), and rinnastaa can also take different subjects depending on the context.
